manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Step 1 | Cleanse A sulfate-free shampoo & conditioner that removes oil & buildup while soothing the scalp. Step 2 | Exfoliate Multitasking body bar cleanses and exfoliates skin, while unique nubs massage and relieve tension. Step 3 | Deodorize This roll-up stick glides on easily to deliver long-lasting odor and wetness protection. Step 4 | Moisturize Quick-penetrating lotion nourishes skin as it cools, soothes, and hydrates. Next page The Jack Black Every Man Morning Routine: 4 Out-the-Door Steps 1 Cleanse 2 Exfoliate 3 Deodorize 4 Moisturize

Our Company Who We Are Founded in 2000, based in Texas, Jack Black was an early pioneer in the luxury men's skincare market. Today Jack Black has grown to become the #1 best-selling men's skincare brand* *Source: The NPD Group Inc/US Prestige Beauty Total Measured Market, Skincare Retail Dollar Sales, Jan 2017-Dec 2017

Previous page Look your best Face No matter your skin type, Jack Black offers superior skincare for all needs. It’s not about the razor Shave Shave & style your facial hair with ease. For all lifestyles Body Give your skin the VIP Treatment. Style your way Hair Simple, easy & effective products crafted specifically with your hair & scalp health in mind. Next page 1 Face 2 Shave 3 Body 4 Hair

Compare & Contrast Charcoal Body Bar Add to Cart Body Bar Scrubbing Soap Add to Cart All-Over Wash Add to Cart Clean Cream Body Wash See Details Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 688 4.7 out of 5 stars 2,604 4.7 out of 5 stars 3,033 — Price $16.00$16.00 $16.00$16.00 $24.00$24.00 — Daily Use ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Exfoliating ✔ ✔ ✘ ✘ Cleanser ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Area of Use Body Body Face, hair, and body Body Sulfate-Free ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

How does the charcoal work? Charcoal helps to absorb odor and dirt from the skin. Why is it called a massaging bar? One side of the bar features unique, raised numbs to massage muscles and relieve tension. Does it exfoliate? Yes. Jojoba Beads help to exfoliate the skin and remove dead skin cells to smooth skin. Legal Disclaimers Sulfate-Free: Natural Efficacy (Provital Group id: 41760).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My father loves this!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my father. Smells great and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells SO good
reviews.reviewText: Last longer than drug store soaps and the exfoliating side is awesome. Again, the scent is just wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Boyfriend LOVES This Soap
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend (he's a bar soap fan and this one seemed interesting...) and he absolutely loves it... and so do I! He loves it because it works well, has a nice smell, and he feels like it really gets in there and cleans well and the nubs do feel nice on his skin. And I love it because it makes him smell INCREDIBLE and makes his skin SO FREAKING SOFT! So far he has taken several showers with it and it seems to be lasting pretty well. Only complaint is that it is kind of expensive for a daily/weekly use product but it is high quality and worth the price as long as we can afford to keep buying it haha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bar but goes quickly
reviews.reviewText: I love this Jack Black product but unfortunately it tests used up too quickly. The bottom is a great massager and clears up blemished on your skin while using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic! Leaves Skin Oil Free and Smooth
reviews.reviewText: The soap is great for exfoliating and clearing body acne. It feels like you’re using a scrub which helps clear away dead skin and clean pours. This isn’t a soap that will make you feel silky smooth after a shower. It clears all the oil off your skin. The soap rinses off easier than any soap I’ve seen before. It leaves you feeling like the grime, oil, and clogged skin is completely gone. You’ll notice a big difference in the feel of your skin after using it once. If your skin ever feels rough because you have a bunch of little hidden blackheads, well after scrubbing with this soap bar you won’t feel them anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I've been using their body washes in gel form for a long time. I think this will be the go-to lather up to go to. I just like it better. And the bar continues to lather up right down to almost nothing left.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hate to give this soap a mediocre review and only 3 stars because I really like it a lot. It's great on the skin, it feels good, it smells good, it exfoliates extremely well. The problem is, I've only used it 5 or 6 times and it's 2/3 gone already. I understand because of the makeup of it, it could deteriorate quickly, but at $16 a bar! That's just too much. It is more economical if I were to buy 3, and I may do that. But it is really expensive for the life it has. I don't know, it's a tough call. I really do like it. But man... You can't just charge that kind of money and expect a great response. It's just too much.

reviews.reviewTitle: Favourite bar soap - nothing else like it.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried almost every luxury soap out there. 10 times better than Baxter’s by far.This is the best feeling soap to use if you want to feel invigorated in the morning. Perfect amount of roughness to wake you up, clean the skin and leave you feeling refreshed. I don’t use everyday as the cone shaped side wears down very quickly (3-4 washes) and the other side or what is left over isn’t quite as rough/brisk. At $15-$20 per bar, I don’t want to be going through 3-4 bars a month, so I use like every 3rd day etc.Amazing scent.Wish it lasted a bit longer on the cone side, or the cones were deeper etc.
Je suis un homme mais j'adore prendre soins de ma peau et cette barre est magique! Elle vaut son prix aucune autre peut la remplacer
Fantastic product but a bit pricey
Nice smell, but the soap didnt last long about 2 weeks, then started to fall apart, for the price was expecting more
